title: Shut Your Pious Hole
description: Libby brings the case against her husband Aaron. Aaron is a minister by occupation, and thinks he should always be upfront about his job when meeting new people. Libby says he should play it cool till he gets to know them a bit better. Who's right? Who's wrong?
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
